EmailTemplate.subject: Details of your role with The Challenge
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact__c},
Congratulations on successfully completing training and being appointed {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} to work on NCS with The Challenge this summer.
I am very pleased to confirm that you will be working on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c} from {!Job_placement__c.RCD_KO_date__c} to {!Job_placement__c.RCD_End_date__c}.
My name is {!Job_placement__c.Wave_APM__c}. I am Assistant Programme Manager (APM) for {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}, and we will be working together this summer on the NCS Real Challenge Design. My contact details are at the end of this email.
This is where you need to be:
-RCD Day Venue Details
This is when you need to be there:
- {!Job_placement__c.RCD_KO_date__c} at 09:00am
It is very important to be on time. Please plan how you're going to get to -RCD Day Venue Name- and check your travel information.
- LINK TO TRAVELINE / TFL.gov
I hope you have a fantastic time with The Challenge this summer!
Best wishes,
{!Job_placement__c.Wave_APM__c}
The Challenge
- Wave APM email -Wave APM phone number
